ch.ffhs.ftoop.interceptor.dame

Interface DameBackendInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Backend

    public interface DameBackendInterface
    Version:
    0.1 Interface to be applied by the game-backend It contains methods to be called by the GUI
    Author:
    MajorTwip

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean applyTurn(Stone stone, Coordinate coordinate)
      applies a move, move stone Stone to a new Coodinate
      Board getActualBoard()
      Returns Board with the actual state of the game

      Checks if it would be legal to move stone Stone to a new Coodinate

      Exits the game.
      void startNewGame(GameMode mode)
      Start a new game.

    • Method Detail

      • startNewGame

        void startNewGame(GameMode mode)
        Start a new game. Should call GUI's method showBoard(Board board), showMessageBox(MessageBox msg) with some Welcometext and initiateTurn();
        Parameters:
        mode - Enum GameType (10x10, 8x8, etc)

      • quitGame

        void quitGame()
        Exits the game. Yields eventually an Alert in am MessageBox

      • getTurnIsLegal

        boolean getTurnIsLegal(Stone stone,
                       Coordinate coordinate)
        Checks if it would be legal to move stone Stone to a new Coodinate
        Parameters:
        stone - Stone to move
        coordinate - Coordinate to move to
        Returns:
        Boolean, true if move would be legal

      • applyTurn

        boolean applyTurn(Stone stone,
                  Coordinate coordinate)
        applies a move, move stone Stone to a new Coodinate
        Parameters:
        stone - Stone to move
        coordinate - Coordinate to move to
        Returns:
        Boolean, true if move was successful

      • getActualBoard

        Board getActualBoard()
        Returns Board with the actual state of the game
        Returns:
        Board with actual state
